description: Detects multiple blocks by the mod_security module (Web Application Firewall) Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Frequent attacks if system faces Internet
name: Multiple Modsecurity Blocks
query: (*mod_security\:\ Access\ denied* OR *ModSecurity\:\ Access\ denied* OR *mod_security\-message\:\ Access\ denied*)
